CircleCI is so fast! Everything starts almost instantly after I push code, and it only takes a few seconds to pull the Docker image and start running steps. GitLab CI was taking about 1-2 minutes before it even started the container

I found a way to save even more time in my CircleCI config - Don't checkout the git repo right away. Manually download files to calculate the checksum, and skip the job if the cache exists. (e.g. bundle install)

I could have done this on GitLab CI too with 'GIT_STRATEGY: none'
